QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsor Commitments Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: All commitments - including child and project sponsorships and recurring gifts
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select sponsor.ID as SPONSORID, sponsor.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID, case when so_child.NAME is null then ltrim (replace (desig.NAME,desig.USERID, '')) else so_child.NAME end as COMMITMENTNAME, case when so.LOOKUPID is null then desig.USERID else so.LOOKUPID end as COMMITMENTID, f_trans.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as COMMITMENTAMOUNT, case when r_sch.FREQUENCYCODE = 0 then 'yr' when r_sch.FREQUENCYCODE = 1 then '6mo' when r_sch.FREQUENCYCODE = 2 then 'qtr' when r_sch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then 'mo' else '' end as COMMITMENTFREQUENCY, case when paymethod.PAYMENTMETHODCODE in (2,3) then 1 -- Credit Card, Direct Debit else 0 end as ISEFT, case when so_child.NAME is not null then 'Child Sponsorship' when so.LOOKUPID is not null then 'Project Sponsorship' else 'Recurring Gift' end as CCOMMITMENTTYPE
from dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION f_trans join dbo.CONSTITUENT sponsor ON sponsor.ID = f_trans.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE r_sch on f_trans.id = r_sch.id left join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD paymethod on f_trans.ID = paymethod.REVENUEID left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT r_split on r_sch.ID = r_split.REVENUEID left join dbo.DESIGNATION desig on r_split.DESIGNATIONID = desig.ID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIP on SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID = r_split.ID and SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1 left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
where f_trans.TYPECODE = 2 -- recurring gift and r_sch.STATUSCODE in (0,1) -- active, held
